headline: Jacobs Awarded Role on US Missile Defense Agency SHIELD Contract
summary: Jacobs (NYSE: J) has been awarded a contract under the U.S. Missile Defense Agency's Scalable Homeland Innovative Enterprise Layered Defense (SHIELD) indefinite-delivery/indefinite-quantity contract, which has a ceiling value of $151 billion. The contract encompasses a broad range of work areas that allows for the rapid delivery of innovative capabilities with increased speed and agility.

headline: Doors Swing Open For Advanced Nuclear In The U.K.
summary: The nuclear renaissance is not just taking place in the US. The UK has published a new nuclear regulatory pathway for enabling the rapid deployment of advanced reactor technology.

headline: 5 Revealing Analyst Questions From Jacobs Solutions’s Q4 Earnings Call
summary: Jacobs Solutions delivered a solid Q1, with revenue and non-GAAP earnings per share both exceeding Wall Street expectations. Management attributed the strong performance to robust growth in life sciences, advanced manufacturing, and critical infrastructure, as well as a record backlog fueled by large project wins. CEO Bob Pragada highlighted marquee contracts such as the Bolivar Roads Gate System and major data center projects, emphasizing that the company’s depth in digital consulting and AI ad
